price: Sọ pé: “Ẹ sọ fún mi, tí Allāhu bá pa èmi àti àwọn tó wà pẹ̀lú mi rẹ́, tàbí tí Ó bá kẹ́ wa (ṣé ẹ lè dí I lọ́wọ́ ni?) Nítorí náà, ta ni ó máa gba àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́ là nínú ìyà ẹlẹ́ta-eléro?
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَهۡلَكَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِيَ أَوۡ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in ahlakaniya al-lahu waman maʿiya aw raḥimanā faman yujīru al-kāfirīna min ʿadhābin alīmin
